name: S C A L E
description:
S    C    A    L    E

Scale is a first person puzzle game prototype which allows you to alter the scale of objects to help you progress. 

H   O   W         T   O      P   L   A   Y

Click on coloured objects to adjust their scale. As this is a prototype, it is possible to get yourself into a position where the puzzle becomes impossible to complete. If this happens, restart the game. 

WASD - Movement

MOUSE - Camera

LMB - Interact

R - Restart Game

I   N   F  O

This prototype was created in Unity by Stuart Lilford. There is scope for additional puzzles and additional objects that do things other than adjust their scale. There were plans to implement objects that shifted gravity when interacted with for instance.
